reviewText:
This is one of PB's better Celebrity gets during the 1990's
Dian Parkinson was a tv star (being on The Price is Right) for Years and being mentally undressed by Bob Barker
Gotta love dirty old men  I find it odd he's all about spaying and neutering pets  but, the man was doing all types of sleazey and shaddy things to the Price Is Right models Bob should've taken his own advice!

Once Dian jumped ship PB came calling offered her a deal and she went with it
and we get her in the pages of Playboy magazines (twice i think)
and a Celebrity Centerfold home video (which is on  Laserdisc, VHS and dvd home video)
The VHS is the easiest to find (and cheapest I'm sure) The Laserdisc is very rare
the dvd isn't anywhere near as rare as the Laserdisc
You can find the dvd in strange places like book stores (that sell used dvd's) & pawn shops

The dvd is without a doubt one of the best/must haves in the Celebrity Centerfold collection
She looks stunning and beautiful it's in her prime Dian Parkinson
The PQ is so/so not amazing just above average this was originally on VHS
they (PB) didn't spend a lot of money putting on the new (at the time) dvd format
  If you can snag a dvd copy on the cheap grab it 9/10

My boyfriend loves to see Jennifer LaVoie in some "Playboy Videos" he owns. He looked up her videography on a DVD and saw he already owned all of the ones listed. His favorite scene with her until now is on "Wet & Wild 5". I did some checking and learned that she is also in a Bonus segment on the Dian Parkinson Celebrity Centerfold. I could not find any "Playmate Profiles" of her, but this Bonus is nearly as long, so he loves it. She is a petite and pretty girl. He likes to see her doing gymnastics. He said he has seen some brief scenes on this DVD on other films, but this one has much more of her. We have not watched Dian Parkinson. Both of us prefer brunettes to blondes. My boyfriend is French, Jewish and Cherokee with some Dutch and English, and I am Southern Chinese, so we both have black hair, brown eyes and tan skins.

There are two reasons why this video stands out above the others.  The first is that Dian Parkinson, a longtime fixture of the "Price is Right", shows that there's more to her than just to gesture at prizes.

The other reason, and the biggest as far as this reviewer is concerned, is that the Playmate Centerfold that follows is Miss August of 1993, Miss Jennifer Lavoie.  The first (and so far only) Playmate from New Hampshire is more than just a pretty face.  She is also very active, which she demonstrates with gymnastic floor exercises.  From playing around on a New England lobster boat, to working out, to a midnight hookup involving cold and wet items from the refrigerator, to a seductive tropical scene that will make you wish you were "Lost" with her, you will think that the wrong beauty was on the cover of the video.

A Good DVD very entertaining. However, she is one of my favorites of all time.

TG / Chicago

Not unhappy with my purchase, would do again.  As always, playboy video concentrates on artsy fartsy nonsense and the model is of secondary consideration.  Glad I bought it, would do again.  Conversely, just another LAME ASS playboy over produced video
